alert.note: Alert for Bosque; Hill (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 26 at 5:10PM CDT until April 26 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Bosque County in central Texas... Northwestern Hill County in central Texas... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 509 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northeast of Meridian, or 14 miles north of Clifton, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 65 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Lake Whitney State Park around 530 PM CDT. Whitney around 540 PM CDT. Aquilla Lake around 610 PM CDT. Hillsboro around 615 PM CDT. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...65 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT.
